about_the_game: This is a free DLC that contains quality ringtones from BGMs in Mirror and Mirror DLC songs. You can find it in the root folder of Mirror.
detailed_description: This is a free DLC that contains quality ringtones from BGMs in Mirror and Mirror DLC songs. You can find it in the root folder of Mirror.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or Later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Mirror Ringtone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: This is a free DLC that contains quality ringtones from BGMs in Mirror and Mirror DLC songs. You can find it in the root folder of Mirror.
supported_languages:
Japanese*, Traditional Chinese, English, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Korean, Thai, Portuguese - Brazil, Ukrainian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
